StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Center for Common Disease Genomics [CCDG] Neuropsychiatric: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) - Whole Exomes

Person.Organization: MASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGYBROAD INSTITUTE, INC.MASSACHUSETTS GENERAL HOSPITAL

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Exome sequencing was performed as part of the CCDG-ASD study supported by NHGRI grant 5UM1HG008895, Lander.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Autism Spectrum Disorder)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ASD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Autism Spectrum Disorder.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Autism Spectrum Disorder, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ASD-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Autism Spectrum Disorder. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Autism Spectrum Disorder, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ASD-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Autism Spectrum Disorder. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Autism Spectrum Disorder, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ASD-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Autism Spectrum Disorder. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Mental Health and Neurology Research, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-MHNR-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Mental Health and Neurology Research. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Autism Spectrum Disorder, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ASD-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Autism Spectrum Disorder and related disorders.
Use of the is limited to Autism Spectrum Disorder, typical brain development, and related disorders.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Rare Disease)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-RARED
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Rare Disease.
Use of the data is limited to research on Rare Disease in children.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Neurodevelopmental and related disorders)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-NDEVRD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Neurodevelopmental and related disorders.

StudyTo.name: dbGaP Collection: Compilation of Individual-Level Genomic Data for General Research Use
